pageProduct.name: Vicks VapoDrops + Cough Honey Lemon Menthol 16 Lozenges
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Sore throats often arrive with a cough and blocked nose. VICKS VapoDrops +COUGH Honey Lemon Menthol Lozenges clears the nose, soothes the throat and relieves coughs.

- Vicks Vapodrops + COUGH lozenges clears the nose, soothes the throat and relieves coughs

- Available in 3 flavours: Orange Menthol, Berry Menthol and Honey Lemon Menthol

- Standard sizes: 16 lozenges | 36 lozenges

Boxed Contents: 16 Lozenges

Size: 16 Pack

KEY FEATURES

• Relieves cough
• Clears blocked nose
• Soothes sore throat
• Contains herbal ingredients

Warnings

CONTAINS hydroxybenzoates. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Contains sugars.
Not to be used in children under 2 years of age without medical advice.
Do not use if blister seal is broken.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Contains Sugars. Contains Herbal ingredients. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.

Ingredients

Each lozenge contains extracts equivalent to dry:

Glycyrrhiza glabra (Liquorice) 15mg
Zingiber officinale (Ginger) 10mg
Phyllanthus emblica (Indian gooseberry) 10mg
Menthol 7 mg

Contains: Hydroxybenzoates. Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Liquorice) 15mg, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) 10mg, Phyllanthus Emblica (Indian Gooseberry) 10mg, Menthol 7mg

Directions

DOSAGE: Adults and Children over 6 years: Dissolve 1 lozenge in your mouth every 2 hours as needed.

USAGE ADVICE

Adults and Children over 6 years:
Dissolve 1 lozenge in your mouth every 2 hours as needed.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.

Storage Temperature: below 25°C
